reviewText: My son has an Italian mother and an American dad.  We watch Mater, or should I say Carl, in both English and Italian.  I think I know the stories by heart, in both languages, and that's the point.  I want my son to have that too, so Pixar to the rescue!  To view this in the US I have a separate DVD just for Italian content, this is a region coded DVD so you'll have to do something similar to view it.
